scripts.install:all: pnpm install && cd backend && pnpm install && cd ../microfrontends/microhub-shell && pnpm install && cd ../auth-microfrontend && pnpm install && cd ../rick-morty-microfrontend && pnpm install
scripts.start: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail --success first "cd backend && pnpm run docker:dev" "cd microfrontends/microhub-shell && pnpm run dev" "cd microfrontends/auth-microfrontend && pnpm run dev" "cd microfrontends/rick-morty-microfrontend && pnpm run dev"
scripts.clean:docker: cd backend && docker-compose -f docker-compose.dev.yml down --volumes --remove-orphans && docker system prune -f
scripts.clean:node_modules: rm -rf node_modules && cd backend && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../microfrontends/microhub-shell && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../auth-microfrontend && rm -rf node_modules && cd ../rick-morty-microfrontend && rm -rf node_modules
